tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE exposures (
 exposure_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 instrument_id INT,
 exposure_value DECIMAL(10, 2),
 date_recorded DATE,
 FOREIGN KEY (instrument_id) REFERENCES financial_instruments(instrument_id)
);

CREATE TABLE exposure_monitoring (
    monitoring_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    instrument_id INT,
    factor_id INT,
    exposure_amount DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE instrument_relationships (
  relationship_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  instrument_id INT NOT NULL,
  category_id INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (instrument_id) REFERENCES financial_instruments(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES instruments_categories(category_id)
);

CREATE TABLE instrument_values (
  value_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  instrument_id INT NOT NULL,
  value_date DATE NOT NULL,
  instrument_value DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (instrument_id) REFERENCES financial_instruments(id)
);

CREATE TABLE risk_exposure (
  exposure_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  instrument_id INT NOT NULL,
  exposure_date DATE NOT NULL,
  exposure_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (instrument_id) REFERENCES financial_instruments(id)
);
